channel.title: Holy fuck
channel.description:
I need help. I'm getting ddosed from a guy who thinks he 'owns' my server. How can I prevent the ddosing attacks? I have his IP and I want to call someone so he gets his ass in jail. What do I do.
74.115.1.42

Should I contact optimum? (my isp)
Ask for a new IP? What should I ask/tell them?

Just call your router company or w.e, and ask them what you should do about it.
[/quote]

I have a temporary solution. I got a friend of mine to attack his IP back (I have it because he logged into my server, and ips are logged on it) so I can try to get a serious answer from here. I don’t want to spend $400 on a firewall that has a chance of not doing shit.

Does anybody have a good proxy[size=1pt]/ddoser[/size] to lend me? ;)[/quote]
Dude, you realize you’re probably going to be banned soon, right?

item.title: Holy fuck
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:21, topic:412006”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=513263.msg3726444#msg3726444 date=1314303378]
Make a ::rape command that sends 30 websites, unipban him and when he logins… BAM! GF. He’d stop after that. If not look for a DDoSer on hackforums.net
[/quote]

Already did that, it’s called ‘::openporn’ and ‘::openvirus’. Don’t worry, ::openporn opens gay porn sites, so no fapping for him, unless…

I already asked on hackforums. Btw I’m using my main computer. Looks like he stopped. Maybe if I leave the server offline for 1 week he’ll leave completely?
I would dos him back but my lil hackin’ tool is on my shit computer, which isn’t working atm, and the doser on it only stays up for 5 minutes before crashing because of a ‘runtime error’.

first of all your getting dosed, ddos is more than one computer, which i doubt hes using. second what i would do is dos him back, get net tools, you should have his ip, unless hes a smart cookie and uses a proxy. i might be able to help you, for i am a hacker, so i know how this stuff works. if you dont want to risk getting caught for dosing, then all i would do is hide your ip, get a proxy, or well theres other stuff but i will explain later. BTW a firewall will do u no good, all they do is stop access from ports (backdoors) they do not stop connections to you. If you want my help just pm, ill be glad to help.

Thanks for the help. Being a ‘hacker’ gets you banned on this site I believe.

I want to dos without using a proxy. What if I get caught? Would I get in trouble for using self-defense?[/quote]

Self defense or not, it’s illegal.

Read full topic

item.title: Holy fuck
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Kalvin, post:15, topic:412006”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=513263.msg3726423#msg3726423 date=1314302489]

Ban the subnet.

How the fuck do I do that? He said he’s going to ddos me all night because he didn’t get admin. I banned him in the chatbox forever. Right now I’m right next to my neighbor’s fence when a hurricane is on it’s way D:
How can I stop this fucker? I guess I could download something from this laptop, put it on a flash drive, and install it onto the main computer…

Anybody know a free ddos protection site?

Edit: Laptop’s about to die.
[/quote]

add this to ur ban file… It mite work mite not

74.115[/quote]

That’s the network.

You’re going to have to add a bit of code to make subnet banning work. An IPv4 address is made of 3 parts

XXX.XXX.YYY.ZZZ

Where X represents the network, Y represents the subnet, and Z represents the host. All hosts on the same subnet are on the same local network. So even if they unplug the router, and the computer is assigned a new host address, they should still be banned. Although, if the addresses vary greatly, I’m not entirely sure how to handle that.

Read full topic
